name: Trouble's Adventure
description:
"Trouble's Adventure" is the game I created to display my skills gained from the OpenGL Course which I took the last semester of my Graduate term, back in December 2018. This game is about a little duck named Trouble that finds himself without his mother and plays around on a sidewalk. The duck can wander around using the W A S D keys. When the duck steps on different objects it will trigger a sound effect and a simple 2-D partial effect. 

For this project I did all the coding, artwork, and sound effects. I retrieved the music from a free online library.
